name: JJ Ramberg
description: JJ is the host of the weekly MSNBC show Your Business. JJ also founded Goodshop.com, which lists the best coupons for more than 30,000 stores, including Gap, 1800Flowers, and Petco. Goodshop also donates a percentage of purchases at many of these stores to nonprofits and schools. To date, Goodshop has raised more than $11 million for good causes!
